about.about_subtitle: Looking for a reliable IT partner to grow your business efficiently? Manasoft delivers modern, fast, and trustworthy digital solutions tailored to your needs.

customers.subtitle: Customer Feedback
customers.title: What Our Clients Say
customers.text: Take advantage of Manasoft’s expertise and bring your business to the next level!
customers.customer1_text: The Manasoft team developed a custom Telegram bot for us. Now orders are processed automatically and customer service has become much faster.
customers.customer2_text: Their financial reporting system made it much easier to track income and expenses. The quality of work is excellent.
customers.customer3_text: Working with Manasoft was easy and convenient. They pay attention to every detail and stay in touch throughout the process.
customers.customer4_text: The Manasoft team helped turn our idea into a real platform. Fast, high-quality, and effective solutions!
customers.customer5_text: They created a custom bot to manage my clients via Telegram. Affordable price and excellent technical support!
customers.customer6_text: Technically skilled team. They built the system with the right architecture and delivered it on time.

services.services_home_title2: Perfect IT Solutions for Your Business
services.services_home_text2: Manasoft – Your Trusted Partner in the IT World! We offer websites, mobile applications, and other advanced technological solutions.
services.services_home_card1_text: Optimize your processes, increase efficiency, and digitize your business with CRM and ERP systems.
services.services_home_card2_text: We create modern and fast mobile applications for iOS and Android. Take your product to the next level!
services.services_home_card3_text: Automate services and grow your business with Telegram bots!
services.services_home_card4_text: We create fast and modern websites tailored to your business. Stand out from the competition with us!
services.services_page_title: Innovative IT Solutions – The Best Services for Your Business
services.services_page_text: Manasoft IT company provides high-quality and innovative IT services. We help grow your business with CRM/ERP systems, Telegram bots, mobile applications, and website development.
services.services_page_card1_title: Modern Mobile Applications for iOS and Android
services.services_page_card1_text: Mobile applications allow your business to interact with customers more efficiently. We develop fast, effective, and modern mobile applications.
services.services_page_card1_xizmatlar: iOS and Android app development, App design and optimization, API and server integration, App deployment to App Store and Google Play
services.services_page_card2_text: If you need a modern website to present your business online, Manasoft offers the best solution for you.
services.services_page_card2_xizmatlar: Corporate and personal websites, E-commerce and online stores, SEO optimization and fast loading, Content management systems (CMS)
services.services_page_card3_text: Telegram bots are an effective tool for customer service, sales, information delivery, and automation. We develop intelligent bots tailored to your business needs.
services.services_page_card3_xizmatlar: Order processing bots, Automatic response bots, Payment system integration, Database management
services.services_page_card4_text: CRM and ERP systems are the best solutions for optimizing business processes, managing customer interactions, and improving efficiency. Manasoft develops customized software solutions tailored to your needs.
services.services_page_card4_xizmatlar: CRM system development and configuration, ERP system creation and integration, Customer data management, Analytical and accounting systems

workpage.workpage_text: The Manasoft team executes each project with precision and quality. Our approach ensures efficiency and innovation!
workpage.card1_text: To create a successful project, we first thoroughly analyze your needs and business goals. At this stage, we gather information and determine the strategic direction.
workpage.card2_text: The key to project success is a clear and well-developed technical specification (TS). We document all requirements and define the project direction.
workpage.card3_text: Selecting the most suitable technologies, analyzing possibilities, and developing necessary integrations. We find the optimal solution for your business!
workpage.card4_text: UX/UI design is a key factor in enhancing user interaction. We create an attractive and functional design that matches your project.
workpage.card5_text: We test how the project will function using an initial prototype. At this stage, core functionalities are formed and preliminary tests are conducted.
workpage.card6_text: The project is fully completed, all functionalities are tested and optimized. We deliver a high-quality final product to our clients!

project_page.subtitle: 100+ projects
project_page.title: Our Projects
project_page.text: Looking for a reliable IT partner to grow your business effectively? Manasoft offers modern, fast, and trustworthy solutions!

project1.banner_subtitle: A Special Mobile App for Women
project1.banner_text: Femmy is a health calendar and daily app essential for every woman.
project1.project_card1_text: Femmy provides all the essential tools for women, including a pregnancy school, mood tracker, ovulation calculator, baby care tips, and gynecologist recommendations.
project1.project_card2_text: Weekly pregnancy recommendations, prenatal and postnatal care, lactation and breastfeeding advice, proper nutrition, and health tips during pregnancy.
project1.project_card3_text: Articles on women's health, detailed information about pregnancy, childbirth, and menopause. Reliable advice verified by gynecologists.
project1.project_card4_text: Femmy is a mobile app designed to help women manage their menstrual cycle, pregnancy, and other physiological conditions. For this project, we created a modern and intuitive landing page design. The design is tailored to women's needs, using soft colors and interface elements that inspire trust.

project2.banner_subtitle: A mobile app for the Imperial Granite factory.
project2.banner_text: Imperial Granite is the official mobile app for customers, sellers, and manufacturers.
project2.project_card1_title: Purpose of the Imperial Granite App
project2.project_card1_text: It connects customers, sellers, and manufacturers, ensuring a seamless interaction process at every stage—from product selection to production and delivery.
project2.project_card2_text: A complete catalog of Imperial Granite products with high-quality photos and descriptions. A simple ordering system. Fast communication between customers, sellers, and manufacturers. Order status notifications.
project2.project_card3_text: Customers can browse the granite product catalog, explore specifications, select desired products, and place orders in just a few steps.

project3.banner_text: MedAgent – designed for medical representatives, pharmaceutical companies, managers, and supervisors.
project3.project_card1_text: MedAgent is an innovative ERP system designed to automate the work of medical representatives, monitor visits to pharmacies and doctors, and manage reports.
project3.project_card2_text: The app allows you to efficiently schedule meetings, track interactions, and analyze results in real-time.
project3.project_card3_text: Manage a database of doctors and pharmacies. Detailed reports on each visit, workflow automation, and real-time tracking of team performance.

project4.banner_subtitle: Alla — Soothing Audio App for Children
project4.banner_text: Alla is a mobile app designed for children aged 0–6 to sleep peacefully, offering reliable audio content and a user-friendly interface tailored to mothers' needs.
project4.project_card1_text: To help children sleep in a calm environment and provide mothers with a convenient and quality tool. Each piece of content is selected based on the child’s age and needs.
project4.project_card2_text: Includes Qur’an verses, classic lullabies, fairy tales, animal sounds, and more. Features like voice recording, favorites list, and a simple child-friendly interface make it easy to use.

project5.banner_subtitle: Rai Group — corporate website of a construction company
project5.banner_text: The Rai Group website provides information about the company's services, projects, and news. It features a modern design, user-friendly navigation, and essential information for users.
project5.project_card1_text: Rai Group is a modern construction company. Through the website, users can learn about its projects, services, and news, as well as contact the company directly.
project5.project_card2_text: The website includes company advantages, a gallery of completed projects, key approaches (quality, reliability, etc.), news updates, construction videos, partner logos, and a contact form for users.

project6.banner_text: The Telegram bot automates webinar registration: the user follows a link, registers, and joins the channel. The organizer communicates with clients through the bot.
project6.project_card1_text: Provides automatic registration, connects users to the webinar channel, builds a user database, and ensures maximum conversion with minimal effort.

project7.banner_subtitle: Hisobchi AI — AI-powered Personal Finance Bot
project7.banner_text: Hisobchi AI is a Telegram bot that accepts income, expenses, and debts via text or voice, analyzes and classifies them using AI. It generates statistics and sends reminders.
project7.project_card1_text: Hisobchi AI is an AI-powered financial assistant that helps users manage income, expenses, and debts easily and quickly. Works via Telegram: users send their data in text or voice, and the bot classifies, analyzes, and provides statistics and reminders.
project7.project_card2_text: AI-based income and expense recognition Debt control and reminders Daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly statistics Understanding text and voice commands

project8.banner_subtitle: A private Telegram community for entrepreneurs
project8.banner_text: ISAEV Full Contact is a private Telegram-based community led by Alisher Isayev, offering practical business insights and real-life strategies. Get access to daily audio messages, video lessons, Zoom calls, and exclusive content for members only.
project8.project_card1_text: ISAEV Full Contact is a closed community created for entrepreneurs across Uzbekistan. Its main goal is to raise the level of entrepreneurship through practical knowledge. You’ll receive Alisher Isayev’s personal insights, weekly Zoom calls, video lessons, and access to an interactive group environment.

project9.banner_subtitle: Take clear steps toward your goals — with Excel planners
project9.banner_text: Lifeplanner.uz is a powerful Excel-based toolkit designed to help you manage goals, tasks, and habits. Plan your days, track your yearly goals, and build better routines for a more productive life — all in one convenient package.
project9.project_card1_text: Lifeplanner.uz is your reliable planning assistant for reaching your goals in 2025. It includes three main planners: Productivity Planner, Task Planner, and Habit Tracker. Each one is designed to help organize your life and boost efficiency.
project9.project_card2_text:
• Plan daily and weekly tasks
• Break big goals into smaller actionable steps
• Build and track good habits
• Monitor and analyze productivity
• Easy-to-use Excel format
• All 3 planners included — just 99,000 UZS

question_page.question_text: If you have any questions, feel free to contact us – we are always ready to help!
question_page.question_card1_text: How long does it take to develop an IT project?
question_page.question_card1_answer: Manasoft is an innovative IT company and your most reliable partner in creating Telegram bots, mobile applications, and websites for your business! Our team implements technologies to deliver efficient solutions. Quality and speed are our top priorities!
question_page.question_card2_text: What information is needed to create a Telegram bot?
question_page.question_card2_answer: To create a Telegram bot, we need a list of required features, the tasks expected from the bot, and information about the payment system if necessary. Based on this, Manasoft will develop a customized bot for you.
question_page.question_card3_text: How is the cost of a mobile app determined?
question_page.question_card3_answer: The price depends on the features you choose, the complexity of the design, and the platforms (iOS/Android). Manasoft prepares individual commercial offers for each client with a transparent pricing policy.
question_page.question_card4_text: Do you also offer SEO optimization for websites?
question_page.question_card4_answer: Absolutely! Websites developed by Manasoft fully meet SEO requirements. We perform all the necessary technical and content optimizations to rank your website higher on Google and other search engines.
question_page.question_card5_text: What are the benefits of using a CRM system?
question_page.question_card5_answer: A CRM system helps manage customer relationships, streamline sales processes, and improve marketing efficiency. Manasoft develops CRM solutions tailored to your business processes.
question_page.question_card6_text: How often will we be in touch during the project?
question_page.question_card6_answer: We maintain regular communication with each client. We provide updates via Telegram, email, or phone calls, and implement required changes. Transparent and effective communication is a top priority at Manasoft.

contact_page.title: Contact Us
contact_page.description: Looking for a reliable IT partner to efficiently grow your business? Manasoft provides you with modern, fast, and reliable solutions!
contact_page.card_text: The Manasoft team is always ready to connect with you! Reach out to us, and we will find the best solution for your business. A fast and professional response is guaranteed!
contact_page.fullName_error2: At least one UPPERCASE letter is required.
contact_page.fullName_error3: At least one lowercase letter is required.
contact_page.phone_error: The phone number must start with +998 and contain 12 digits.
contact_page.message_error: The message must contain at least 10 characters.
contact_page.success: Your message has been successfully sent!
contact_page.error_message: Something went wrong while sending the message, please try again.
